courses.who_for: Louisiana drivers taking a course for court dismissal (Art. 892.1) or voluntary insurance discount (R.S. 22:1457).
requirements: Court permission required for ticket-related dismissals
Enroll in LA OMV-approved provider (classroom or online)

submission.certificate: Submit certificate to court for ticket dismissal; submit to insurance agent for discount
submission.reporting: Providers issue certificates; no central reporting to OMV
submission.deadlines: Court sets deadlines (often 30–60 days); insurance discount valid 3 years

court_vs_insurance.court: Course can set aside/dismiss ticket if completed on time (once per certain period).
court_vs_insurance.insurance: Voluntary completion yields up to 10% discount (3 years validity); must resubmit every 3 years.

sources.name: Louisiana Code of Criminal Procedure Art. 892.1
